original: Majjhima Nikāya 48
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Kosambiyasutta
analyzed: kosambiya sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā kosambiyam viharati ghosita ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena kosambiyaṁ bhikkhū bhaṇḍanajātā kalahajātā vivādāpannā aññamaññaṁ mukhasattīhi vitudantā viharanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena kosambiyam bhikkhū bhaṇḍana jātā kalaha jātā vivāda āpannāḥ aññam aññam mukha sattīhi vitudantāḥ viharanti

original: Te na ceva aññamaññaṁ saññāpenti na ca saññattiṁ upenti, na ca aññamaññaṁ nijjhāpenti, na ca nijjhattiṁ upenti.
analyzed: te na ca iva aññamaññam saññāpenti na ca saññattim upenti na ca aññamaññam nijjhāpenti na ca nijjhattim upenti

original: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho aññataraḥ bhikkhu yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho saḥ bhikkhu bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “idha, bhante, kosambiyaṁ bhikkhū bhaṇḍanajātā kalahajātā vivādāpannā aññamaññaṁ
analyzed: idha bhante kosambiyam bhikkhū bhaṇḍana jātā kalaha jātā vivāda āpannā

original: mukhasattīhi vitudantā viharanti, te na ceva aññamaññaṁ saññāpenti, na ca saññattiṁ
analyzed: mukha sattīhi vitudantāḥ viharanti te na ca iva aññam aññam saññāpenti na ca saññatti

original: upenti, na ca aññamaññaṁ nijjhāpenti, na ca nijjhattiṁ upentī”ti.
analyzed: upenti na ca aññam aññam nijjhāpenti na ca nijjhattim upenti iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā aññataram bhikkhum āmantesi

original: “ehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mama vacanena te bhikkhū āmantehi:
analyzed: ehi tva bhikkhu mama vacanena te bhikkhū āmantehi

original: ‘satthā vo āyasmante āmantetī’”ti.
analyzed: satthā vaḥ āyasmante āmantā iti iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū etadavoca:
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho saḥ bhikkhu bhagavataḥ paṭissutvā yena te bhikkhū tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū etat avoca

original: “satthā āyasmante āmantetī”ti.
analyzed: satthā āyasmante āmantā iti iti

original: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
analyzed: evam āvuso ti kho te bhikkhū tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu

original: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinne kho
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam ekamantam nisīdisu ekamantam nisinne kho

original: te bhikkhū bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: te bhikkhū bhagavān etat avoca

original: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhaṇḍanajātā kalahajātā vivādāpannā aññamaññaṁ mukhasattīhi vitudantā viharatha,
analyzed: saccam kira tumhe bhikkhave bhaṇḍana jātā kalaha jātā vivāda āpannāḥ aññam aññam mukha sattīhi vitudantāḥ viharatha

original: te na ceva aññamaññaṁ saññāpetha, na ca saññattiṁ upetha, na ca aññamaññaṁ nijjhāpetha, na ca nijjhattiṁ upethā”ti?
analyzed: te na ca iva aññamaññam saññāpetha na ca saññattim upetha na ca aññamaññam nijjhāpetha na ca nijjhattim upetha ati

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: eva bhante

original: “Taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhikkhave,
analyzed: tam kim maññatha bhikkhave

original: yasmiṁ tumhe samaye bhaṇḍanajātā kalahajātā vivādāpannā aññamaññaṁ mukhasattīhi vitudantā
analyzed: yasmin tumhe samaye bhaṇḍana jātā kalaha jātā vivāda āpannā aññam aññam mukha sattīhi vitudantā

original: viharatha, api nu tumhākaṁ tasmiṁ samaye mettaṁ kāyakammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti sabrahmacārīsu
analyzed: viharatha api nu tumhākam tasmin samaye mettam kāya kammam paccupaṭṭhitam hoti sabrahmacārīsu

original: āvi ceva raho ca, mettaṁ vacīkammaṁ …pe… mettaṁ manokammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti sabrahmacārīsu
analyzed: āvi ca iva rahaḥ ca mettam vacī kammam pe mettam manaḥ kammam paccupaṭṭhitam hoti sabrahmacārīsu

original: āvi ceva raho cā”ti?
analyzed: āvi ca iva rahaḥ ca ati

original: “No hetaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: naḥ heta bhante

original: “Iti kira, bhikkhave, yasmiṁ tumhe samaye bhaṇḍanajātā kalahajātā vivādāpannā aññamaññaṁ
analyzed: iti kira bhikkhave yasmin tumhe samaye bhaṇḍana jātā kalaha jātā vivāda āpannā

original: mukhasattīhi vitudantā viharatha, neva tumhākaṁ tasmiṁ samaye mettaṁ kāyakammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ
analyzed: mukha sattīhi vitudantāḥ viharatha na iva tumhākam tasmin samaye mettam kāya kammam paccupaṭṭhita

original: hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ceva raho ca, na mettaṁ vacīkammaṁ …pe… na mettaṁ manokammaṁ
analyzed: hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ca iva raho ca na mettam vacī kammam pe na mettam manaḥ kamma

original: paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ceva raho ca.
analyzed: paccupaṭṭhitam hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ca iva raho ca

original: Atha kiñcarahi tumhe, moghapurisā, kiṁ jānantā kiṁ passantā bhaṇḍanajātā kalahajātā
analyzed: atha kiñcarahi tumhe mogha purisā kim jānantā kim passantā bhaṇḍana jātā kalaha jātā

original: vivādāpannā aññamaññaṁ mukhasattīhi vitudantā viharatha, te na ceva aññamaññaṁ saññāpetha,
analyzed: vivāda āpannāḥ aññam aññam mukha sattīhi vitudantāḥ viharatha te na ca iva aññam aññam saññāpetha

original: na ca saññattiṁ upetha, na ca aññamaññaṁ nijjhāpetha, na ca nijjhattiṁ upetha?
analyzed: na ca saññattim upetha na ca aññamaññam nijjhāpetha na ca nijjhattim upetha

original: Tañhi tumhākaṁ, moghapurisā, bhavissati dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāyā”ti.
analyzed: tat hi tumhāka moghapurisā bhavissati dīgharattam ahitāya dukkhāya ati

original: Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “chayime, bhikkhave, dhammā sāraṇīyā piyakaraṇā garukaraṇā saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṁvattanti.
analyzed: cha ime bhikkhave dhammā sāraṇīyā piya karaṇā garu karaṇā saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya savattanti

original: Katame cha?
analyzed: katame cha

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno mettaṁ kāyakammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ceva raho ca.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ mettam kāya kammam paccupaṭṭhitam hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ca iva rahaḥ ca

original: Ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo piyakaraṇo garukaraṇo saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: ayam pi dhammo sāraṇīyaḥ piya karaṇaḥ garu karaṇaḥ saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya savattati

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno mettaṁ vacīkammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ceva raho ca.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ mettam vacī kammam paccupaṭṭhitam hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ca iva rahaḥ ca

original: Ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo piyakaraṇo garukaraṇo saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: ayam pi dhammo sāraṇīyaḥ piya karaṇaḥ garu karaṇaḥ saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya savattati

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno mettaṁ manokammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ceva raho ca.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ mettam manaḥ kammam paccupaṭṭhitam hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ca iva rahaḥ ca

original: Ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo piyakaraṇo garukaraṇo saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: ayam pi dhammo sāraṇīyaḥ piya karaṇaḥ garu karaṇaḥ saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya savattati

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ye te lābhā dhammikā dhammaladdhā antamaso pattapariyāpannamattampi,
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu ye te lābhā dhammikā dhamma laddhā antamasaḥ patta pariyāpanna mattam pi

original: tathārūpehi lābhehi appaṭivibhattabhogī hoti sīlavantehi sabrahmacārīhi sādhāraṇabhogī.
analyzed: tathārūpehi lābhehi appaṭivibhatta bhogī hoti sīlavantehi sabrahmacārīhi sādhāraṇa bhogī

original: Ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo piyakaraṇo garukaraṇo saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: ayam pi dhammo sāraṇīyaḥ piya karaṇaḥ garu karaṇaḥ saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya savattati

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni a sabalāni

original: akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni samādhisaṁvattanikāni tathārūpesu
analyzed: a kammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni a parāmaṭṭhāni samādhi savattanikāni tathārūpesu

original: sīlesu sīlasāmaññagato viharati sabrahmacārīhi āvi ceva raho ca.
analyzed: sīlesu sīla sāmañña gataḥ viharati sabrahmacārīhi āvi ca iva raho ca

original: Ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo piyakaraṇo garukaraṇo saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: ayam pi dhammo sāraṇīyaḥ piya karaṇaḥ garu karaṇaḥ saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya savattati

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yāyaṁ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu yā ayam diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa

original: sammā dukkhakkhayāya tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharati sabrahmacārīhi āvi ceva raho ca.
analyzed: sammā dukkha kkhayāya tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhi sāmañña gataḥ viharati sabrahmacārīhi āvi ca iva raho ca

original: Ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo piyakaraṇo garukaraṇo saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: ayam pi dhammo sāraṇīyaḥ piya karaṇaḥ garu karaṇaḥ saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya savattati

original: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha sāraṇīyā dhammā piyakaraṇā garukaraṇā saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṁvattanti.
analyzed: ime kho bhikkhave cha sāraṇīyāḥ dhammāḥ piya karaṇāḥ garu karaṇāḥ saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyāḥ ekībhāvāya savattanti

original: Imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, channaṁ sāraṇīyānaṁ dhammānaṁ etaṁ aggaṁ etaṁ saṅgāhikaṁ etaṁ saṅghāṭanikaṁ—yadidaṁ yāyaṁ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya.
analyzed: imesam kho bhikkhave channam sāraṇīyānam dhammānam etam aggam etam saṅgāhikam etam saṅghāṭanika yat idam yā ayam diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkha kkhayāya

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, kūṭāgārassa etaṁ aggaṁ etaṁ saṅgāhikaṁ etaṁ saṅghāṭanikaṁ yadidaṁ kūṭaṁ;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave kūṭāgārassa etam aggam etam saṅgāhikam etam saṅghāṭanikam yat idam kūṭa

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, imesaṁ channaṁ sāraṇīyānaṁ dhammānaṁ etaṁ aggaṁ etaṁ saṅgāhikaṁ
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave imesam channam sāraṇīyānam dhammānam etam aggam etam saṅgāhika

original: etaṁ saṅghāṭanikaṁ yadidaṁ yāyaṁ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya.
analyzed: etam saṅghāṭanikam yat idam yā ayam diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkha kkhayāya

original: Kathañca, bhikkhave, yāyaṁ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya?
analyzed: katham ca bhikkhave yā ayam diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkha kkhayāya

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu arañña gataḥ vā rukkha mūla gataḥ vā suññāgāra gataḥ vā iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘atthi nu kho me taṁ pariyuṭṭhānaṁ ajjhattaṁ appahīnaṁ, yenāhaṁ pariyuṭṭhānena pariyuṭṭhitacitto yathābhūtaṁ nappajāneyyaṁ na passeyyan’ti?
analyzed: atthi nu kho me tat pariyuṭṭhānam ajjhattam appahīna yena aham pariyuṭṭhānena pariyuṭṭhita cittaḥ yathābhūtam na pajāneyyam na passeyyanti

original: Sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhito hoti, pariyuṭṭhitacittova hoti.
analyzed: sace bhikkhave bhikkhu kāma rāga pariyuṭṭhitaḥ hoti pariyuṭṭhita cittaḥ va hoti

original: Sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhu byāpādapariyuṭṭhito hoti, pariyuṭṭhitacittova hoti.
analyzed: sace bhikkhave bhikkhu byāpāda pariyuṭṭhitaḥ hoti pariyuṭṭhita cittaḥ va hoti

original: Sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhu thinamiddhapariyuṭṭhito hoti, pariyuṭṭhitacittova hoti.
analyzed: sace bhikkhave bhikkhu thinamiddha pariyuṭṭhitaḥ hoti pariyuṭṭhita cittaḥ va hoti

original: Sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uddhaccakukkuccapariyuṭṭhito hoti, pariyuṭṭhitacittova hoti.
analyzed: sace bhikkhave bhikkhu uddhacca kukkucca pariyuṭṭhitaḥ hoti pariyuṭṭhita cittaḥ va hoti

original: Sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhito hoti, pariyuṭṭhitacittova hoti.
analyzed: sace bhikkhave bhikkhu vicikicchā pariyuṭṭhitaḥ hoti pariyuṭṭhita cittaḥ va hoti

original: Sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhu idhalokacintāya pasuto hoti, pariyuṭṭhitacittova hoti.
analyzed: sace bhikkhave bhikkhu idhaloka cintāya pasutaḥ hoti pariyuṭṭhita cittaḥ va hoti

original: Sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paralokacintāya pasuto hoti, pariyuṭṭhitacittova hoti.
analyzed: sace bhikkhave bhikkhu para loka cintāya pasutaḥ hoti pariyuṭṭhita cittaḥ va hoti

original: Sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhaṇḍanajāto kalahajāto vivādāpanno aññamaññaṁ mukhasattīhi vitudanto viharati, pariyuṭṭhitacittova hoti.
analyzed: sace bhikkhave bhikkhu bhaṇḍana jātaḥ kalaha jātaḥ vivāda āpannaḥ aññam aññam mukha sattīhi vitudantaḥ viharati pariyuṭṭhita cittaḥ va hoti

original: So evaṁ pajānāti:
analyzed: saḥ evam pajānāti

original: ‘natthi kho me taṁ pariyuṭṭhānaṁ ajjhattaṁ appahīnaṁ, yenāhaṁ pariyuṭṭhānena pariyuṭṭhitacitto yathābhūtaṁ nappajāneyyaṁ na passeyyaṁ.
analyzed: natthi kho me tat pariyuṭṭhānam ajjhattam appahīna yena aham pariyuṭṭhānena pariyuṭṭhita cittaḥ yathābhūtam na pajāneyyam na passeyya

original: Suppaṇihitaṁ me mānasaṁ saccānaṁ bodhāyā’ti.
analyzed: su paṇihitam me mānasam bodhāya ati

original: Idamassa paṭhamaṁ ñāṇaṁ adhigataṁ hoti ariyaṁ lokuttaraṁ asādhāraṇaṁ puthujjanehi.
analyzed: idam assa paṭhamam ñāṇam adhigatam hoti ariyam lokuttaram asādhāraṇam puthujjanehi

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave ariya sāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘imaṁ nu kho ahaṁ diṭṭhiṁ āsevanto bhāvento bahulīkaronto labhāmi paccattaṁ samathaṁ, labhāmi paccattaṁ nibbutin’ti?
analyzed: imam nu kho aham diṭṭhim āsevantaḥ bhāventaḥ bahulīkarontaḥ labhāmi paccattam samatha labhāmi paccattam nibbutinti

original: So evaṁ pajānāti:
analyzed: saḥ evam pajānāti

original: ‘imaṁ kho ahaṁ diṭṭhiṁ āsevanto bhāvento bahulīkaronto labhāmi paccattaṁ samathaṁ, labhāmi paccattaṁ nibbutin’ti.
analyzed: imam kho aham diṭṭhim āsevantaḥ bhāventaḥ bahulīkarontaḥ labhāmi paccattam samatha labhāmi paccattam nibbutinti

original: Idamassa dutiyaṁ ñāṇaṁ adhigataṁ hoti ariyaṁ lokuttaraṁ asādhāraṇaṁ puthujjanehi.
analyzed: idam assa dutiyam ñāṇam adhigatam hoti ariyam lokuttaram asādhāraṇam puthujjanehi

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave ariya sāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘yathārūpāyāhaṁ diṭṭhiyā samannāgato, atthi nu kho ito bahiddhā añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgato’ti?
analyzed: yathārūpāya aham diṭṭhiyā samannāgataḥ atthi nu kho itas bahiddhā aññaḥ samaṇaḥ vā brāhmaṇaḥ vā tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgato ti

original: So evaṁ pajānāti:
analyzed: saḥ evam pajānāti

original: ‘yathārūpāyāhaṁ diṭṭhiyā samannāgato, natthi ito bahiddhā añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgato’ti.
analyzed: yathārūpāya aham diṭṭhiyā samannāgataḥ na atthi itas bahiddhā aññaḥ samaṇaḥ vā brāhmaṇaḥ vā tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgataḥ ti

original: Idamassa tatiyaṁ ñāṇaṁ adhigataṁ hoti ariyaṁ lokuttaraṁ asādhāraṇaṁ puthujjanehi.
analyzed: idam assa tatiyam ñāṇam adhigatam hoti ariyam lokuttaram asādhāraṇam puthujjanehi

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave ariya sāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘yathārūpāya dhammatāya diṭṭhisampanno puggalo samannāgato, ahampi tathārūpāya dhammatāya samannāgato’ti.
analyzed: yathārūpāya dhamma tāya diṭṭhi sampannaḥ puggalo samannāgataḥ aham pi tathārūpāya dhamma tāya samannāgataḥ ti

original: Kathaṁrūpāya ca, bhikkhave, dhammatāya diṭṭhisampanno puggalo samannāgato?
analyzed: katharūpāya ca bhikkhave dhammatāya diṭṭhi sampannaḥ puggalaḥ samannāgataḥ

original: Dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa:
analyzed: dhamma tā esā bhikkhave diṭṭhi sampannassa puggalassa

original: ‘kiñcāpi tathārūpiṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati, yathārūpāya āpattiyā vuṭṭhānaṁ paññāyati, atha kho naṁ khippameva satthari vā viññūsu vā sabrahmacārīsu deseti vivarati uttānīkaroti;
analyzed: kiñca api tathārūpim āpattim āpajjati yathārūpāya āpattiyāḥ vuṭṭhānam paññāyati atha kho nam khippam eva satthari vā viññūsu vā sabrahmacārīsu deseti vivarati uttānīkaroti

original: desetvā vivaritvā uttānīkatvā āyatiṁ saṁvaraṁ āpajjati’.
analyzed: desetvā vivaritvā uttānīkatvā āyatim savaram āpajjati

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, daharo kumāro mando uttānaseyyako hatthena vā pādena vā aṅgāraṁ akkamitvā khippameva paṭisaṁharati;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave daharaḥ kumāraḥ mandaḥ uttānaseyyakaḥ hatthena vā pādena vā aṅgāram akkamitvā khippam eva paṭisaharati

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, dhammatā esā diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa:
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave dhamma tā esā diṭṭhi sampannassa puggalassa

original: ‘kiñcāpi tathārūpiṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati yathārūpāya āpattiyā vuṭṭhānaṁ paññāyati, atha kho naṁ khippameva satthari vā viññūsu vā sabrahmacārīsu deseti vivarati uttānīkaroti;
analyzed: kiñca api tathārūpim āpattim āpajjati yathārūpāya āpattiyāḥ vuṭṭhānam paññāyati atha kho nam khippam eva satthari vā viññūsu vā sabrahmacārīsu deseti vivarati uttānīkaroti

original: desetvā vivaritvā uttānīkatvā āyatiṁ saṁvaraṁ āpajjati’.
analyzed: desetvā vivaritvā uttānīkatvā āyatim savaram āpajjati

original: So evaṁ pajānāti:
analyzed: saḥ evam pajānāti

original: ‘yathārūpāya dhammatāya diṭṭhisampanno puggalo samannāgato, ahampi tathārūpāya dhammatāya samannāgato’ti.
analyzed: yathārūpāya dhamma tāya diṭṭhi sampannaḥ puggalo samannāgataḥ aham pi tathārūpāya dhamma tāya samannāgataḥ ti

original: Idamassa catutthaṁ ñāṇaṁ adhigataṁ hoti ariyaṁ lokuttaraṁ asādhāraṇaṁ puthujjanehi.
analyzed: idam assa catuttham ñāṇam adhigatam hoti ariyam lokuttaram asādhāraṇam puthujjanehi

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave ariya sāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘yathārūpāya dhammatāya diṭṭhisampanno puggalo samannāgato, ahampi tathārūpāya dhammatāya samannāgato’ti.
analyzed: yathārūpāya dhamma tāya diṭṭhi sampannaḥ puggalo samannāgataḥ aham pi tathārūpāya dhamma tāya samannāgataḥ ti

original: Kathaṁrūpāya ca, bhikkhave, dhammatāya diṭṭhisampanno puggalo samannāgato?
analyzed: katharūpāya ca bhikkhave dhammatāya diṭṭhi sampannaḥ puggalaḥ samannāgataḥ

original: Dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa:
analyzed: dhamma tā esā bhikkhave diṭṭhi sampannassa puggalassa

original: ‘kiñcāpi yāni tāni sabrahmacārīnaṁ uccāvacāni kiṅkaraṇīyāni tattha ussukkaṁ āpanno hoti, atha khvāssa tibbāpekkhā hoti adhisīlasikkhāya adhicittasikkhāya adhipaññāsikkhāya’.
analyzed: kiñca api yāni tāni sabrahmacārīnam uccāvacāni kiṅkaraṇīyāni tattha ussukkam āpannaḥ hoti atha khvā assa tibbā apekkhā hoti adhi sīla sikkhāya adhi citta sikkhāya adhi paññā sikkhāya

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, gāvī taruṇavacchā thambañca ālumpati vacchakañca apacinati;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave gāvī taruṇa vacchā thambañca ālumpati vacchakañca apacinati

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, dhammatā esā diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa:
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave dhamma tā esā diṭṭhi sampannassa puggalassa

original: ‘kiñcāpi yāni tāni sabrahmacārīnaṁ uccāvacāni kiṅkaraṇīyāni tattha ussukkaṁ āpanno hoti, atha khvāssa tibbāpekkhā hoti adhisīlasikkhāya adhicittasikkhāya adhipaññāsikkhāya’.
analyzed: kiñca api yāni tāni sabrahmacārīnam uccāvacāni kiṅkaraṇīyāni tattha ussukkam āpannaḥ hoti atha khvā assa tibbā apekkhā hoti adhi sīla sikkhāya adhi citta sikkhāya adhi paññā sikkhāya

original: So evaṁ pajānāti:
analyzed: saḥ evam pajānāti

original: ‘yathārūpāya dhammatāya diṭṭhisampanno puggalo samannāgato, ahampi tathārūpāya dhammatāya samannāgato’ti.
analyzed: yathārūpāya dhamma tāya diṭṭhi sampannaḥ puggalo samannāgataḥ aham pi tathārūpāya dhamma tāya samannāgataḥ ti

original: Idamassa pañcamaṁ ñāṇaṁ adhigataṁ hoti ariyaṁ lokuttaraṁ asādhāraṇaṁ puthujjanehi.
analyzed: idam assa pañcamam ñāṇam adhigatam hoti ariyam lokuttaram asādhāraṇam puthujjanehi

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave ariya sāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘yathārūpāya balatāya diṭṭhisampanno puggalo samannāgato, ahampi tathārūpāya balatāya samannāgato’ti.
analyzed: yathārūpāya bala tāya diṭṭhi sampannaḥ puggalo samannāgataḥ aham pi tathārūpāya bala tāya samannāgataḥ ti

original: Kathaṁrūpāya ca, bhikkhave, balatāya diṭṭhisampanno puggalo samannāgato?
analyzed: katharūpāya ca bhikkhave bala tāya diṭṭhi sampannaḥ puggalo samannāgataḥ

original: Balatā esā, bhikkhave, diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa yaṁ tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye desiyamāne aṭṭhiṁ katvā manasikatvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasoto dhammaṁ suṇāti.
analyzed: bala tā esā bhikkhave diṭṭhi sampannassa puggalassa yam tathāgata ppavedite dhamma vinaye desiyamāne aṭṭhim katvā manasikatvā sabba cetasā samannāharitvā ohita sotaḥ dhammaṃ suṇāti

original: So evaṁ pajānāti:
analyzed: saḥ evam pajānāti

original: ‘yathārūpāya balatāya diṭṭhisampanno puggalo samannāgato, ahampi tathārūpāya balatāya samannāgato’ti.
analyzed: yathārūpāya bala tāya diṭṭhi sampannaḥ puggalo samannāgataḥ aham pi tathārūpāya bala tāya samannāgataḥ ti

original: Idamassa chaṭṭhaṁ ñāṇaṁ adhigataṁ hoti ariyaṁ lokuttaraṁ asādhāraṇaṁ puthujjanehi.
analyzed: idam assa chaṭṭham ñāṇam adhigatam hoti ariyam lokuttaram asādhāraṇam puthujjanehi

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave ariya sāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘yathārūpāya balatāya diṭṭhisampanno puggalo samannāgato, ahampi tathārūpāya balatāya samannāgato’ti.
analyzed: yathārūpāya bala tāya diṭṭhi sampannaḥ puggalo samannāgataḥ aham pi tathārūpāya bala tāya samannāgataḥ ti

original: Kathaṁrūpāya ca, bhikkhave, balatāya diṭṭhisampanno puggalo samannāgato?
analyzed: katharūpāya ca bhikkhave bala tāya diṭṭhi sampannaḥ puggalo samannāgataḥ

original: Balatā esā, bhikkhave, diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa yaṁ tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye desiyamāne labhati atthavedaṁ, labhati dhammavedaṁ, labhati dhammūpasaṁhitaṁ pāmojjaṁ.
analyzed: bala tā esā bhikkhave diṭṭhi sampannassa puggalassa yam tathāgata ppavedite dhamma vinaye desiyamāne labhati attha veda labhati dhamma veda labhati dhamma upasahitam pāmojja

original: So evaṁ pajānāti:
analyzed: saḥ evam pajānāti

original: ‘yathārūpāya balatāya diṭṭhisampanno puggalo samannāgato, ahampi tathārūpāya balatāya samannāgato’ti.
analyzed: yathārūpāya bala tāya diṭṭhi sampannaḥ puggalo samannāgataḥ aham pi tathārūpāya bala tāya samannāgataḥ ti

original: Idamassa sattamaṁ ñāṇaṁ adhigataṁ hoti ariyaṁ lokuttaraṁ asādhāraṇaṁ puthujjanehi.
analyzed: idam assa sattamam ñāṇam adhigatam hoti ariyam lokuttaram asādhāraṇam puthujjanehi

original: Evaṁ sattaṅgasamannāgatassa kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa dhammatā susamanniṭṭhā hoti sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya.
analyzed: evam sattaṅga samannāgatassa kho bhikkhave ariya sāvakassa dhamma tā su samanniṭṭhā hoti sotāpatti phala sacchikiriyāya

original: Evaṁ sattaṅgasamannāgato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako sotāpattiphalasamannāgato hotī”ti.
analyzed: evam sattaṅga samannāgataḥ kho bhikkhave ariya sāvako sotāpatti phala samannāgataḥ hoti iti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Kosambiyasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ aṭṭhamaṁ.
analyzed: kosambiya suttam niṭṭhitam aṭṭhama
